title: Is the music of Rick Astley's 'Together Forever' and 'Never Gonna Give You Up' just a variation of a theme? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. So is everything that was ever produced by Stock, Aitken and Waterman. e.g. Kylie Minogue, Dead or Alive, Bananarama, Mel & Kim, Sinitta, Jason Donovan, Rick Astley, etc. They had about three variants of a standard backing track, a couple of different bass lines, a few different sets of melody samples, and a different front singer. They were a blight on the musical landscape of the 80s.
